arts.ttl: Cifuentes keen for QPR to remain grounded despite good recent form
arts.sum: “I’ve been saying always that football is a game of small margins,” said Cifuentes after his side beat Luton thanks to a fortunate winning goal that came via a deflection off defender Morgan Fox. “Now we need to keep pushing because there is no room for complacency, no room to think we have five wins in a row and now things are all good because we have to improve and improve quite a lot.”

arts.ttl: QPR boss Cifuentes credits impact of substitutes in Luton win and explains Southampton loanee’s midfield role
arts.sum: It was a difficult game because of the way Luton play – very direct with a lot of players who can run in behind. “Jonathan [Varane] had a yellow card so we thought it could be a good introduction for him to start some minutes in midfield to get the rhythm of the game and then drop him into his more natural position, and I think he did really well.

arts.ttl: Edwards left wondering what Luton have done wrong to be punished by freak QPR winner
arts.sum: Fox deflects free kick into the net as R’s take all three points

arts.ttl: Rob Edwards claims ‘gods are against’ Luton as loss to QPR deepens drop fears
arts.sum: The Luton manager, Rob Edwards, claimed the footballing gods are against his side after they were beaten 2-1 at Queens Park Rangers to deepen their relegation fears. A fortunate deflected goal by the QPR defender Morgan Fox condemned Town to a fourth straight Championship defeat – and 10th in a row away from home. Luton are in danger of successive relegations, sitting two points above the bottom three. Continue reading...
How we rated the players. The post QPR v Luton player ratings appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Ten straight defeats on the road for Luton as Fox's fluke hands QPR victory
Cifuentes warns against complacency after another QPR victory
arts.sum: Rangers reaction. The post Cifuentes warns against complacency after another QPR victory appeared first on West London Sport.
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Queens Park Rangers and Luton.

arts.ttl: Morgan Fox scores fortunate winner as QPR beat Luton
arts.sum: Fox’s winner lifted QPR, who won only one of their first 16 matches this season, up to 13th in the table.

arts.ttl: Luton beaten at in-form QPR to pile further pressure on Edwards
arts.sum: QPR condemned Luton to a 10th defeat in a row away from home as they beat them 2-1.
